title: Himi 53
lyrics:
M.NG.
1.
Kovi lahi ki he kakai
Ta’e manavahē,
Ki he houhau angatonu
‘A honau ‘Otua.
2.
‘Oka fakaha totonu
‘E hotau ‘Otua,
‘A hono houhau vela
Pea lingi hifo.
3.
‘A e kakai angahala
Ke mou ‘amanaki,
Ki he fu’u ‘uha mamafa
‘O e ngaahi houhau.
4.
Ka mou teu, ke mou talia
‘A homou ‘Otua,
‘Oku teu hā’ele hifo
Ki he fakamaau.
5.
Mou vakai, ki hono fitu
‘O e kau ‘āngelo,
‘Oku lingi hifo ‘ene
Hina ki he ‘atā.
6.
Vakai, ‘oku hopo ‘a e
Ngaahi fu’u mo’unga,
Mei honau ngaahi tu’unga
Pea ‘ikai ‘ilo.
7.
He kuo nau puna atu
Ki he fu’u loloto,
Pea kuo ngalo hifo
‘I he fu’u moana.
8.
Pe kohai ‘e fa’a mo’ui
Pea hanga hake;
Ki he fu’u taloni, mo e
‘Eiki fakamaau.
9.
‘Oka puna ‘a e langi
Pea mo māmani,
Pea mole, ‘e fēfē au
Kau fakahā fēfē?  *
